resources.string:
non-sectarian & non-political organization 

 working since years dedicated to spreading 

 authentic Islamic knowledge of 

 Al Quran & Sunnah

NurulQuran Institute is a non-profit, non-sectarian & non-political organization working since years dedicated to spreading authentic Islamic knowledge of Al Quran & Sunnah
through education & social welfare while making it easily attainable for all walks of life. Our Vision is to Enlighten the hearts, homes and lives with the Nur of Al Quran.
For More Details Visit Us : NurulQuran.com nq-international.com
